description:
2017年5月大学英语六级口语考试第三场次的论述题目：谈论对电子支付的看法。

电子支付在日常生活中越来越普遍，很多时候，人们可以不用携带钱包，只拿手机出门即可。可是电子支付就是万能的吗？使用过程中又该注意到什么呢？

以上问题都是考生在谈论电子支付时可以考虑到的论述内容。

e-pay is becoming more and more popular in our life.(总述）There is joke that you can have no cash or payment card in your pocket, but you cannot have no cell phone in hand, as a cell phone can help you pay for what you want to buy. （引出现象）Indeed, e-pay can be realized almost everywhere you want to buy something, which definitely makes our life more convenient. But the security of e-pay should not be overlooked. There are some reports that once the passwords of e-pay were let out, your money could be soon transferred by the intruder. Therefore, though e-pay brings more convenience to our life, we must attach great importance to the security of e-pay.
